      • check

        public void check(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage)
        Launch this method to show the app rater dialog if the conditions are met. Before calling this method, you should call setAppTitle(String) and setAppName(String). Two aditional calls are setDaysUntilPrompt(int) and setLaunchesUntilPrompt(int)
        Parameters:
        stage -
